trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona la clase base de los elementos de un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework supplies two specialized classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, which represents individual elements, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, which represents a series of grouped subelements.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework proporciona dos clases especializadas que se derivan de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, que representa los elementos individuales, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, que representa una serie de subelementos agrupados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor establece la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> propiedad `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> asociado a este elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control that contains this element.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contiene este elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when the element is associated with a different <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando el elemento está asociado con un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> distinto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user interface (UI) state of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el estado de la interfaz de usuario del elemento.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values representing the state.
trans-unit.target: Una combinación bit a bit de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> que representan el estado.

trans-unit.source: The states specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> values are enforced by the UI but may be programmatically overruled.
trans-unit.target: Los estados especificados por el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> valores se aplican mediante la interfaz de usuario, pero puede reemplazar mediante programación.
